duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the liaison between the customer and the software development team via clearly documented process requirements.
Work DSARs in ServiceNow system, execute playbook (excel), update system flows based on interviews, document analysis, business process descriptions, workflow analysis and use cases.
Perform access, SOC and control reviews as needed.
Lead, manage, and execute audits of the information technology & cybersecurity control design and effectiveness in accordance with information technology & security, authoritative sources.
Assess the information technology control environment and recommend enhancements and improvements to control activities, measures, and routines.
Define and deliver key performance indicators on audit issue and control weakness closure rate.
Engage Enterprise Security Office as appropriate in support of security related control testing and remediation as warranted.
Incorporate business strategy into decision-making process, mentor less experienced associates on strategies.
Align solutions with IT strategy and standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Cybersecurity, or a related field (Master's preferred)
